SELECT qs.fUuid AS 'uuid', c.fUserID AS 'userID', qs.fCustomerUuid AS 'customerUuid', c.fContactPerson AS 'contactPerson', o.fOrganizationName AS 'organizationName', qs.fDomain AS 'domain', qs.fSearchEngine AS 'searchEngine', qs.fBearPawNumber AS 'bearPawNumber',
qs.fPcGroup AS 'pcGroup',
qs.fPhoneGroup AS 'phoneGroup',
qs.fType AS 'type', qs.fCreateTime AS 'createTime', qs.fStatus AS 'status', qs.fRenewalStatus AS 'renewalStatus', qs.fCrawlerStatus AS 'crawlerStatus', qs.fAutoCrawlKeywordFlag AS 'autoCrawlKeywordFlag' FROM t_qz_setting qs JOIN t_customer c ON qs.fCustomerUuid = c.fUuid LEFT JOIN t_userinfo u ON u.fLoginName = c.fUserID LEFT JOIN t_organization o ON o.fUuid = u.fOrganizationID WHERE 1 = 1 AND c.fUserID = #{qzSettingSearchCriteria.loginName} AND o.fUuid = #{qzSettingSearchCriteria.organizationID} AND qs.fCustomerUuid = #{qzSettingSearchCriteria.customerUuid} AND qs.fDomain = #{qzSettingSearchCriteria.domain} AND u.fUuid = #{qzSettingSearchCriteria.userInfoID} AND qs.fSearchEngine = #{qzSettingSearchCriteria.searchEngine}
AND qs.fPcGroup > '' AND qs.fPcGroup = #{qzSettingSearchCriteria.group}
AND qs.fPhoneGroup > '' AND qs.fPhoneGroup = #{qzSettingSearchCriteria.group}
AND qs.fUpdateStatus = #{qzSettingSearchCriteria.updateStatus} AND qs.fStatus = #{qzSettingSearchCriteria.status} AND qs.fRenewalStatus = #{qzSettingSearchCriteria.renewalStatus} AND qs.fAutoCrawlKeywordFlag = #{qzSettingSearchCriteria.autoCrawlKeywordFlag}
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM t_qz_keyword_rank_info qk WHERE qk.fQZSettingUuid = qs.fUuid AND qk.fDataProcessingStatus = 1 AND qk.fTerminalType = #{qzSettingSearchCriteria.terminalType} AND qk.fWebsiteType = #{qzSettingSearchCriteria.standardSpecies} )
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM t_qz_operation_type qot WHERE qs.fUuid = qot.fQZSettingUuid AND qot.fOperationtype = #{qzSettingSearchCriteria.terminalType} AND qot.fOptimizationType = #{qzSettingSearchCriteria.optimizationType} AND qot.fIsDeleted = 0 )
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM t_qz_keyword_rank_info qk WHERE qk.fQZSettingUuid = qs.fUuid AND qk.fTerminalType = #{qzSettingSearchCriteria.terminalType}
AND qk.fIncrease <= -0.1 AND qk.fOneWeekDifference <= -5
AND qk.fIncrease = 0
AND qk.fIncrease >= 0.1 AND qk.fOneWeekDifference >= 5
AND qk.fAchieveLevel > 0
AND qk.fAchieveLevel = 0
AND qk.fDifferenceValue <= 0.1
AND qk.fTodayDifference < 0
AND qk.fTodayDifference = 0
AND qk.fTodayDifference > 0
AND qk.fDataProcessingStatus = 1 )
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM t_qz_category_tag qc WHERE qc.fQZSettingUuid = qs.fUuid AND qc.fTagName = #{qzSettingSearchCriteria.categoryTag})
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM t_machine_info mi WHERE mi.fUsingOperationType = #{qzSettingSearchCriteria.operationType}
AND mi.fGroup = qs.fPcGroup
AND mi.fGroup = qs.fPhoneGroup
AND mi.fTerminalType = #{qzSettingSearchCriteria.terminalType} )
AND qs.fCreateTime >= #{qzSettingSearchCriteria.createTime} AND qs.fCreateTime <= #{qzSettingSearchCriteria.createTimePrefix}
AND EXISTS (select qs.fUuid from t_qz_operation_type ot where qs.fUuid = ot.fQZSettingUuid and ot.fNextChargeDate = CURDATE())
AND EXISTS (select qs.fUuid from t_qz_operation_type ot where qs.fUuid = ot.fQZSettingUuid and ot.fNextChargeDate < CURDATE())
AND EXISTS (select qs.fUuid from t_qz_operation_type ot where qs.fUuid = ot.fQZSettingUuid and ot.fNextChargeDate BETWEEN date_add(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND date_add(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 3 DAY))
AND EXISTS (select qs.fUuid from t_qz_operation_type ot where qs.fUuid = ot.fQZSettingUuid and ot.fNextChargeDate BETWEEN date_add(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 4 DAY) AND date_add(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY))
ORDER BY qs.fUpdateTime

SELECT qs.fSearchEngine AS 'searchEngine', qs.fPcGroup AS 'pcGroup', qs.fPhoneGroup AS 'phoneGroup' FROM t_qz_setting qs WHERE 1 = 1 AND qs.fCustomerUuid = #{customerUuid}
AND qs.fDomain = #{domain}

mapper.select: SELECT fPcGroup AS 'pcGroup', fPhoneGroup AS 'phoneGroup' FROM t_qz_setting WHERE fUuid = #{uuid}

SELECT qs.fUuid AS 'uuid', qs.fDomain AS 'domain', qs.fCustomerUuid AS 'customerUuid', qs.fBearPawNumber AS 'bearPawNumber', qs.fIgnoreNoIndex AS 'ignoreNoIndex', qs.fIgnoreNoOrder AS 'ignoreNoOrder', qs.fCaptureTerminalType AS 'captureTerminalType' FROM t_qz_setting qs WHERE qs.fType = 'qz' AND qs.fRenewalStatus = 1 AND qs.fAutoCrawlKeywordFlag = 1 AND qs.fCaptureTerminalType > '' AND (qs.fUpdateStatus IS NULL OR qs.fUpdateEndTime IS NULL OR (qs.fUpdateStatus = 'Completed' AND qs.fUpdateEndTime < DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL qs.fUpdateInterval DAY)) OR (qs.fUpdateStatus = 'Processing' AND DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 20 MINUTE) > qs.fUpdateStartTime) OR (qs.fUpdateStatus = 'DownloadTimesUsed' AND qs.fUpdateEndTime < CURRENT_DATE()) ) LIMIT 1

SELECT qs.fUuid AS 'uuid', qs.fDomain AS 'domain' FROM t_qz_setting qs WHERE qs.fCrawlerStatus = 'new' AND qs.fSearchEngine = '百度' LIMIT #{taskNumber} UNION ALL SELECT qs.fUuid AS 'uuid', qs.fDomain AS 'domain' FROM t_qz_setting qs WHERE qs.fCrawlerStatus = 'processing' AND qs.fCrawlerTime <= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 10 MINUTE) AND qs.fSearchEngine = '百度' LIMIT #{taskNumber} UNION ALL SELECT qs.fUuid AS 'uuid', qs.fDomain AS 'domain' FROM t_qz_setting qs WHERE qs.fCrawlerStatus = 'finish' AND qs.fCrawlerTime <= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL #{crawlerHour} HOUR) AND qs.fSearchEngine = '百度' LIMIT #{taskNumber}
